personality tests by similarminds.com I'm crazy, yes?
Haha, I didn't think it would be that big.
This reminds me how I still want a nose job really bad.

Here's the thing, I don't care about any of you anymore.

And you, I really need you here because I'm beginning to believe that I'm just as dead as you are.

After a night like last night, or even this weekend for that matter has really taught me who people truly are. Fake. Purely fake. 

Children, you are childish. Please grow up, both sides of you. I am honestly amazed of the mentality that you have. I don't think there is one. I know the story, I know the facts. I was there. Don't try to persuede me otherwise like you have already. My friends might be childish at times resorting to violonce to solve things, but you took it too far. You took it too far right when you told me to get out of the house because those kids were going to die and not have a bone in their body left. You took it too far when you stated that the house was "going to get sprayed." I stayed. I stayed because you're ridiculous, and by saying you're going there tonight to "fuck shit up."(!?!?!?) Honestly, grow the fuck up. Nobody cares anymore about the situation. Or about you. You are taking it too far and I fear for the safety of others now. 

Tania, I'm not mad at you. I defended you even after you had left. I am irritated because you tend to choose boys over your friends all the time. I'm used to it, as you know I'm used to a lot of things by now. This happens to be one of those things I've just accepted. I already know if you read this you'll denfend Matt, that's fine. I'm not mad at you. I expect that from you. Although, I already know that you'll take this the wrong way.

As for the usual one, fuck you. You're a fucking liar. I am never speaking to you again and I mean it this time. This was the last time I was made to look like an idiot and believe your fucking lies.
Fool me once, shame on you.
Fool me 987568 times, shame on me one fucking million times.

I'm done feeling dumb.
I'm done with people being fake.
I'm done with people.

All I've ever wanted was for someone to make me real. And make me feel real. That is obviously not the case anymore. I don't want anyone anymore.

I'm that one girl you hear about that continuously gets fucked over by the people she loves the most. My name's Nina. What's up?

This is not a, "Aw poor me post." I honeslty don't give a fuck anymore. I haven't for a long fucking time. I'm used to it. The feeling is numb to me. I'm beginning not to care about anyone anymore. As bad as that sounds. I don't care anymore. 

Me putting this in my journal for anyone to see is an example of me not caring anymore.

Let the madness begin. <3

H X C N O W: you have stupid hair
H X C N O W: looks like god pooped in his hand and said this is ninas hair

H X C N O W: yes

I just have no time nor patience to put those up as well. They'll be on here eventually though. ♥ So I had kiloids cut of of my right ear on Saturday. It was disgusting, a bit painful, and..disgusting. I got all my jewelery changed in my ears though. Now they're all pretty and colorful.. and clean most importantly. I saw Miss Katelyn yesterday and she gave my the best christmas gift EVER. <3 This weekend was mediocore. Nothing too special. Nothing that really stood out. Again, randomness.

..and the cycle continues.
unfuckingbelieveable.
somebody help me.
then again, i don't need help.
i need a break.






in other news i got my wrist pierced.
i need to stop.

So somewhere along the line I realized that my journal is indeed my journal for my thoughts, my opinions on things. Lately, I haven't been able to do that without getting criticism from nameless people or people that just don't matter and are completely irrelevant in my life. I want to be able to write freely in my journal without thinking, "oh shit, this is going to upset someone." Again, my journal. So for the first time in almost 3 years that i've had this thing, my journal is finally
friends only. comment to be added.

la la. if you notice, anything commented on the last entry that pretained to the previous enties were deleted. i hope that i won't have to start screening comments now in my own journal. yeah, i won't. haha. so today i learned: i am black now. i even like to jump rope. peppermint eels: I'll fucking kill you first peppermint eels: then I can go to prison. 10 minutes later.. peppermint eels: And I'm saving up to buy a vespa. peppermint eels: to take you on dates with. hahaha, you are either bi-polar or out of your mind. i'm scared now. p.s. doug, did you like my useage of italics, or did i use it wrong?

edit/deleted entries

 In reference to the previous entries posted on my journal, it has come to my acknowledgment that my involvement with frivolous comments, posted by extraneous parties, who CHOOSE to remain nameless on their own free will, is pointless for nothing can be gained by either party. For this reason, I would flauntingly wish to return to a more palatable state. ♥

the funny thing about this is that these are really old. these are all the back from march, like before i was half blonde and when my hair was shorter and before well.. a lot of things haha.. aw, memories. it's a nina and a katie in government, doing absolutely nothing. what a surprise. random stupid picture of me. i think this picture is everywhere now, i'm just trying to get rid of it once and for all from my computer. peter trying to massage me/get me ready for sex. either way. me getting laid, or peter rather. me feeling pretty good. drunk, yes? plus "yeah" by usher was on so i was like orgasming. trying to dance on carissa's bed. god help me. the end.

i think my eyes are a bit more open now. i see things that i haven't necessarily seen before. i know i'll be fine. Tom, I love you, I love you, I love you, and i can't say it enough. Thank you for last night. haha, that sounded sexual. ;] Thank you for being my best friend. <3

So I sit here thinking about everything that has changed in the past year. In merely a year, everything is the exact opposite and at the same time I love it, but at the same time I hate it. I have never been the type of peron that does adapt well to change in any shape or form at all. I always like things to stay the way that they are. Around this exact time last year, I met someone that was nothing short of amazing (yes, that's you tom), formed new friendships while others faded away. And yes, it was nice that I was with Jason and absolutely nothing was wrong between us. Everything was perfect. I can remember Mike and I staying up on the phone until god knows when EVERY NIGHT watching t.v. together and making up spanish subtitles and laughing until it hurt and we were both in tears. I mean sure, right now isn't all bad, i have gained back my brittany and everything is okay in my world, and I don't mean to sound selfish but it is simply not good or nearly as good as it was last year. Which makes me miss just about everything and think about everything. Yes, it makes me miss Mike. It makes me miss Jason. It makes me miss Steve. It makes me miss last summer and all of the wonderful things that I learned and experienced last year. To put it simply, I have been embracing the past for quite sometime and I can't bring myself to reality. I don't really think that I want to, but I have to. All good things come to an end, and maybe it's time now that I accept it, no matter how hard a reject that concept. I just can't help that I can remember when it was good and I am left with all of the memories. I know I won't forget a thing. I'm simply left here constantly dreaming. All that love that I had was too good to last, and I'm too old to dream anymore. This whole life is too good to last, yet I'm too young to care. I'm stuck. And I overanalyze and overanalyze and drive myself crazy time and time again. I'm just tired. My mind is so disorganized and chaotic. I suppose I just need everything to get back on track again. This might not even making sense anymore, I won't re-read it though, because then I won't post it. My ramblings you've just witnessesd are just an example of a small portion of what goes through my head constanty. I guess i'll get over it. Nothing will ever stay the same.

no 03. did you send this to your crush? i did not send it to anyone. 04. did your crush send this to you? no f a s h i o n | s t u f f 01. where is your favorite place to shop? hollister, urban outfitters 02. any tattoos or piercings? my ears, i'm not of legal age to do anything else yet. :[ s p e c i f i c s 01. do you do drugs? no 02. what kind of shampoo do you use? bed head. 03. what are you most scared of? cockroaches. i hyperventilate. 04. what are you listening to right now? yes 15. used someone? yes 16. done something you regret? too many things. c u r r e n t clothes: jeans, striped shirt, batman skivvies. i'm ready for life. music: muse - absolution, i said that already. smell: some floral scent tht my body wash smells like. favorite band: vagina desktop picture: audrey hepburn book you're reading: Choke by Chuck Palahniuk cd in player: Prince, greatest hits. dvd in player: My Fair Lady L a s t p e r s o n you touched: my brother, because i pushed him to get out of the room just now. imed: i can't remember, i imed tom earlier today.. i think that was the last. you yelled at: again, my brother. a r e | y o u understanding: yes arrogant: can be insecure: yes interesting: am i? random: oh yes. hungry: i'm not sure. i guess. smart: i can be. moody: yes hardworking: depends organized: no healthy: no shy: sometimes difficult: yes attractive: meh bored easily: no messy: yes responsible: sometimes obsessed: with who? angry: i have my moments sad: not right now, that's for before i go to bed. disappointed: yes happy: yes hyper: not right now trusting: yes talkative: yes legal: :[ 2 and a half more weeks.. July 7th. :] w h o | d o | y o u | w a n n a kill: you slap: jason :] get wasted with: i'm not getting wasted with anyone for awhile. get high with: i don't really want to get high. look like: god, i see too many pretty girls that are prettier than me that i want to look like. talk to offline: tom, because something is bothering him and i'm worried about him. :[ talk to online: no one really. r a n d o m in the morning i am: tired, dirty.. like x-tina. all i need is: love love is: a risk i dream about: i'd rather not say, no it's not naughty or anything. w h i c h | i s | b e t t e r coke or pepsi: pepsi flowers or candy: flowers tall or short: tall, sorry brit.<3 (god, i'm ging to totally get my ass kicked now.) o p p o s i t e | s e x what do you notice first: how much they make me smile. last person you slow danced with: peter, when i was drunk, it tried to dip me, and dropped me. he can be very careless. or me and becky, when we were having a dance-off and telling people that they got served.. i can't remember which was last. take your pick. who makes you laugh: brittany, peter, among others here and there. who makes you smile: my friends who gives you a funny feeling when you see them: hm, good question Last person you kissed: last person i truly kissed, jason. last person i drunken kissed, peter.. yes, i made out with a gay guy. no straight guys want to make out with me anymore. d o | y o u | e v e r sit on the internet all night waiting for that someone to IM you: no save conversations: yes wish you were a member of the opposite sex: i think it would be weird to have something just hanging there. wish you were younger: no! i am young. july 7th hurry up. cry because someone said something to you: yes f i n a l | q u e s t i o n s 01. do you like filling these out: i have nothing else to do right now, so sure. 02. gold or silver: silver, white gold 03. what was the last film you saw at the movies: shrek 2 04. favorite cartoon: fairly oddparents/south park 05. what did you have for breakfast this morning: nothing 06. who would you love being locked in a room with: jason, so i can finally get everythng out of the way. 07. could you live without your computer: i'd get too bored. 08. would you color your hair: i have like 78 colors in it now. 09. could you ever get off the computer: yes? 10. habla espanol: c? i don't know, i am soo not mexican 11. how many people are on your buddy list: 119 12. drink alcohol: yes 13. like watching sunrises or sunsets: both 14. what hurts the most: a broken heart whoa, i haven't done one of those in forever. so today i opened my refrigorator and the whole top shelf of glass contained condiments fell all over the floor and broke.. glass got in my foot and my foot was all bloody. ah lovely. just lovely. so that was my big event for the day, i battled with death. i'm like a super hero now. i can probably defeat even spider man now. i'm obviously going crazy. so i've been sick just about all summer so that hasn't really been fun. who knew you can get sun poisoning? of course, that's what i get. followed by 46 days of fevers and sore throats. magical, simply magical. so, august 16 is a long ways away..brittany, get your ass back home. thank you. adam and i found out that only snoop dog informs him when his phone is ringing. it's fucking amazing. i only wish i was that lucky. the end.<3

Everything I have in my head, it begins to fade away. I search for it and I long for it. Now I know it's gone. Everything has slipped away. And I'm so overwhelmed. Everything that rests upon my shoulders fell. I would like to tell anyone who has depended on me for themselves, I'm sorry. Everyone I've held in my arms, I believe I've pushed away. I would be there if I could be there, but as it stands I'm gone. Everyone has slipped away. And don't be overwhelmed: Everyone that loved me more than I could tell, I'm sorry. There's a private hell for anyone who lives to only love themselves. Everyone has slipped away. Everything has slipped away. <3

(psh.) + me and brittany as a team totally kicked peter's ass and put cake all over him. + trisha was on my side since john laid brittany. + i have wet cake in my hair. + my vagina is my pressure valve. + this probably doesn't make sense. + scott is my boyfriend now, proving that i am indeed a "boyfriend stealer." + i am the love of trisha's life.. well one of them. + dirty hoe. goodnight<3
